Pengedar Narkoba yang Jual Senpi Rakitan Beli Perlengkapan di Online
04 Nov 2019, 21:57 by Matius Alfons
Tangerang Selatan - Tersangka penjual senjata api rakitan, Cahyo (26) menggunakan semacam kode untuk membeli berbagai macam bahan dasar senjata hingga peluru tajam. Tersangka yang juga pengedar narkoba itu membeli perlengkapan untuk membuat senpi rakitan di situs jual beli online.
"Jadi dia beli di media online dengan kode-kode tertentu--kita praktikan juga, nah kalau pesen peluru kaliber 22 itu di online ga ada pasti, tapi dengan kode tertentu, dia kasih tau saya--saya coba praktikan melalui HP rekan-rekan itu terungkap ternyata ada kaliber 22 dijual online ada itu," kata Kapolsek Ciputat Kompol Endy Mahandika kepada wartawan di Polres Tangerang Selatan, Serpong, Tangerang Selatan, Senin (4/11/2019).
Endy mengatakan tersangka membeli bahan dasar untuk merakit senjata itu dari berbagai situs jual beli online. Bahan dasar seperti selongsong hingga pegas senjata api, disebut Endy dijual bebas secara online.
"Semua (toko online) itu dengan segala password bisa keluar tanpa kita ketahui termasuk selongsongnya, pegasnya itu semua ada," ucap Endy.
Endy menyebut, kode-kode untuk jual-beli bahan pembuatan senpi itu diketahuinya secara otodidak. Tersangka menggunakan kode 2 huruf untuk membelinya.
"Dia iseng aja, jadi kayak jenis senjata revolver itu dia ngga tulis revolver lengkap, tapi mungkin misal dia pake kode RE, EL, atau LV. Itu kode dia katanya ngarang aja, jadi otodidak itu, dari Doogle, dari YouTube," ujarnya.
Sebelumnya Polres Tangerang Selatan menangkap Cahyo terkait kepemilikan narkoba dan beberapa pucuk senjata api. Tersangka dikenakan UU narkotika nomor 35 tahun 2009 dan UU darurat no 12 tahun 51 dengan ancaman hukumam maksimal 20 tahun.

Drug Dealers who Sell Assembly Items Buy Equipment Online
Nov 04 2019, 21:57 by Matthew Alfons
Tangerang Selatan - The suspect of the seller of homemade firearms, Cahyo (26) uses a kind of code to buy various basic materials from weapons to live ammunition. The suspect, who is also a drug dealer, bought equipment to make homemade senpi on an online trading site.
"So he bought it online with certain codes - we practice it too, now if you order 22 caliber bullets online there is no certainty, but with a certain code, he tells me - I try to use it via colleagues' cellphones. "It was revealed that there was 22 caliber sold online there," said Ciputat Police Chief Commissioner Endy Mahandika to reporters at the South Tangerang Police Station, Serpong, South Tangerang, Monday (11/04/2019).
Endy said the suspect bought basic ingredients to assemble the weapons from various online trading sites. Basic materials such as casings to spring firearms, called Endy, are sold freely online.
"All (online stores) with all the passwords can come out without us knowing, including the shells, the springs are all there," said Endy.
Endy said, he knew the codes for buying and selling materials for the senpi. The suspect used a 2-letter code to buy it.
"He was just for fun, so like the type of revolver, he didn't write the complete revolver, but maybe for example he used the RE, EL, or LV code. That was the code he said he made up, so he taught himself, from Doogle, from YouTube," he said.
Previously the South Tangerang District Police arrested Cahyo regarding drug possession and several firearms. The suspect is subject to narcotics law number 35 of 2009 and emergency law number 12 years 51 with a maximum legal threat of 20 years.
